metadata.title: CVE-2021-34550 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tor before 0.4.6.5, aka TROVE-2021-006. The v3onion service descriptor parsing allows out-of-bounds memory access, and aclient crash, via a crafted onion service descriptor

criterions.comment: tor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
